text: Sheets is canvas-based — NO clickable cell elements. Use ds_type with Tab/Enter for cells | NOT ds_click
text_short: Sheets: ds_type+Tab/Enter for cells, not ds_click
warn_text: STOP clicking cells. Sheets has NO clickable cell elements. Use ds_type with Tab/Enter ONLY.

text: For bulk data: build TSV in PowerShell, Set-Clipboard, Ctrl+V — instant, zero drops, formulas preserved
text_short: Bulk data: PowerShell TSV + clipboard paste

text: Formulas with semicolons corrupt during ds_type — always paste via clipboard
Cell navigation: Tab=right, Enter=down (returns to start column), Ctrl+Home=A1, Escape=exit edit mode
Read cell values: Ctrl+A, Ctrl+C then PowerShell Get-Clipboard — canvas has no DOM for cells
Date format: click 'Weitere Formate' dropdown, then 'Datum und Uhrzeit (benutzerdefiniert)' — toolbar Datum button is not in tool list
Rename sheet: click title field, Ctrl+A to select all, then type new name — field inserts at cursor, not replaces
If Ctrl+Home/Ctrl+V fails: click the sheet tab title first to ensure Sheets has input focus, then retry
